tIoSTg0XLgsQNrSY5jZc_g.text: This Wendy's sucks balls! Got a Jr bacon cheeseburger. Towards the end of burger there was hair or string in and on my burger. The string could have been from someone's clothing & the wind made it land on my burger. I go up & ask for a refund for the burger because who knows how much string I already ate! The manager gives me no problems & gives me a refund. However the worker had something to say, in hush hush tones of course;bothered that I asked for a refund for a burger that was dirty.

gfgEKTFk7cjSzs641h0x-w.text: Pulled into drive through.  Waited 5 minutes to order once at the speaker and then waited 15 min in line after ordering.  This place has serious issues plus staff is not courteous non of them act like they care to be there.   Wont be back ever

RfIoxByeqQg1hCGcGORGPg.text: IDK. I see a lot of negative reviews but I thought I had a nice experience. First of all, yeah, I'm biased. You give me a Carolina Classic and a medium Dr. Pepper in my hands and I'm a happy man. But seriously, not too long of a line, friendly guy behind the counter, "fast" food, full but not too loud crowd, walked-so-no-need-to-park, and so I was happy with my lunch today. As for the sandwiches itself, it was just as good as the first one I had. Hey, it got me through the whole trip to Target. And mattress firm. Then I had to go get a smoothie but you know it was a hot day.

Bs2KEyYWF8x_s2VsSKSV4A.text: The food is good and the drive thru service is fast...to a fault.  The food is always good and hot.  If I had to review the food it would have 4 to 5  stars; but the service on a particular day this month was a  little troubling.  I come to this Wendy's often.  I work in the area and they are always moving very fast. and it seems if you are not on the same pace they are a litte annoyed.  My order was $4 and some change.  I gave the cashier a $10 bill and she only gave me change back as if I gave her a $5 bill.  I asked for the rest of my change and she said you only gave me a $5 bill.  I told her she was wrong and she called for the supervisor...actaully she yelled for the supervisor.  I pulled to the front talked with the supervisor, they count her drawer and it was as I said...I gave her a $10 bill.    I don't think the young lady was trying to scam me BUT I know they are moving very fast and they need to slow down b/c incidents sunch as these  The supervisor was blah towards me and not very apologetic at all.  If the supervisor was apologetic I would have felt better.    I would just make sure you say out loud what you are giving the cashier so you both are aware of the money given.

FrujXlhIw3e1BpU5XHMYTA.text: Slowest Wendy's in Charlotte. Seems like they need to work on their operations and efficiency because they're having customers drive away due to long drive thru wait times.

8IihGCianS95wQ_uuDrE8g.text: Sanatation rating a solid 98.5. I did get fast service and the food was hot. However I'm never a fan of the same person who took cash from the guy in front of me going to get my fries without gloves or washing their hands. Just a pet peeve of mine I guess.

G114nktMJ4RHRiWgvNRKSA.text: Slowest Wendy's in the history of Wendy's. It's so close to my house and easy to get to but literally the worst customer service around. I refuse to go there anymore because I will be in the drive thru for a minimum of twenty minutes. Be warned.

yCnAJ73ghZoXh3kH_yWL_A.text: I got stale buns here once. Like, not even edible. I've never received good food here off the 99cent value menu. The people seem friendly, but the service is slow. Pony up a few more bucks and go to Chipotle across the street

Sgs6AAz4sw52nRPSU4yatw.text: Wendy's is decent at making burgers but they can not make a good grilled chicken sandwich...at least one that is not wet...and it is not just this location, it is at all of them.   Atmosphere - Newer, clean, busy, funny   Food - I ordered the grilled chicken sandwich. While labeled as improved, it still was damp to the point of making the bun soggy. I think they keep these things in a bath of chicken broth to maintain moisture. For my side, I opted for the healthy mandarin oranges instead of fries. This gave the girl at the the counter a good laugh...as she said "Oh, how cute".   Service - Despite being made fun of...it was great. I called the counter girl out on it, in a funny way, by telling her that I was watching my figure. This got her and the girl behind her to laugh.   Price - combo meal $6.54   Overall - I look forward to trying that apple pecan salad...you know..because I am watching my figure!

3aLdFmJLT42FuOIsr5Fptg.text: That's right.. Im writing about a Wendys.  Well.. When you impress me on all levels, this is what you get.  Well done Wendys.  Food came out looking like it does in the commercials and ever so fast.  The staff was friendly and experienced.  Annnnnnndd it was delicious.  Enjoy! PS. I love you chocolate frosty. Ian M.

VQ6Y3i48gDdQDDUNNuwdKA.text: Proximity to Target = win.  Otherwise this is your standard Wendy's.  Quick fast food service.  I always order off of the value menu.  Jr. Bacon cheeseburger, value fries, and depending on how hot it is outside a value Frosty or a value pop.  Oh!  They carry PEPSI products, not coke products here.  Blew my mind right out the window.

umA-sbbgOBLXV2hBHc10CA.text: It's late. I get it. But for someone to not even say a word let alone look at you is just pathetic. No "thank you" no "have a good night" nothing. Just an eye roll and attitude. I don't expect much when it comes to fast food. But seriously this is pathetic.

4d8J2oyBKtY0Bgkhpk1f6w.text: Terrible, this place sucks. I have eaten here often , due to being in close proximity to work, the employees seem to mosey around at their own convenience, take their sweet time taking your order, making the food., refilling your drink. They could learn a thing or two from Chic-fil-A

I0Y35rpZfU7WSPQgWt1phA.text: Horrible. I came to get a vanilla frosty and half way down I see a hair. It wasn't mine because my hair was up and it is long. I wish I would have seen it before leaving rather than being half way done and almost home. This is unacceptable. I wish I would've read the reviews before wasting my money on a chain restaurant. Wendy's- do better.

photos.caption: Photo of Wendy's - Charlotte, NC, United States

i11kvddcDyh35jfXWWvH6g.text: Worst Wendy's ever. Staff is all completely rude, always mess up my order and I have sat in the drive through no less than 15 minutes EVERY visit.

89vLu9q5c9tce4ZeaWJNSw.text: This is not a fast food restaurant.  This is the slowest restaurant in Charlotte. None of the employees seem to care, either.  New employees all around!

OrLsTEfScdpDSrVry2dKRw.text: Employees are very unfriendly and the restaurant inside was disgusting. Not sure how this place is still operational.

photos.caption: Photo of Wendy's - Charlotte, NC, United States
Photo of Wendy's - Charlotte, NC, United States
Photo of Wendy's - Charlotte, NC, United States

6Qt2ICUW4fAFHeb9moFJXQ.text: Poor customer service. Wendy's decided to close at 3am instead of their posted 4am close time. That wasn't even the bad part of the experience. They had me waiting on a long line of cars (20 minutes)

VwUW7jkYBqcf2sst-Ffrpg.text: Wednesday Jan 4th 730 pm crew is The slowest, mute, non customer service having group I have seen. The lady making sandwiches messed up 3 sandwiches including mone during the 30 min frame I was there. No one seems to be in charge. They all should seek other employment because their attitudes were not welcoming to ANY of the customers.. clearly the chain of command here does not enforce customer service skillsI will never return!!!

hLqc6Z1t_rARgq0K_uRfCA.text: Super busy location, right next to the Target. It's a drive-through which I always find very helpful.  Standard Wendy's menu. I really like the value menu items because i find them to be an excellent, uh, value. Low cost, good eats. The "junior deluxe cheeseburger" has an actual piece of lettuce (not shredded) and a proper slice of tomato on there. By default, also mustard which I think doesn't belong on a burger.  Very organized, quick service. Top notch for a Wendy's.

photos.caption: Photo of Wendy's - Charlotte, NC, United States

WaMgEzSCTUHSLJyGd27gew.text: If I could give zero stars I would. While visiting this location, the fountain drink machine essentially exploded on my daughter who is nine years old and sprayed orange dye all over one of her favorite shirts. When I spoke to the manager-Brian-he told me "it's not our problem, we lease those machines". When I asked him if he was seriously addressing a significant customer concern that way, he said "yes, there's nothing we can do for you". After repeating this exchange multiple times due to my amazement, he shrugged and walked off. I called their customer service hotline to report the incident and they told me they would report it to Management and call me back for details... four days later, they have yet to return my call.  Avoid this restaurant at all costs. And did I mention... It's probably one of the dirtiest restaurants I have ever been in.

JEKDyC8FJPY5XeDC9Ewmng.text: DO NOT EAT HERE. This is by far the worst Wendy's ever! Super slow service, employees don't care about customers, always seem to be understaffed. If you want to wait 30min for your meal then go ahead. You are better off finding another Wendy's location or just ordering takeout from the multiple burger restaurants around this area. I have emailed them multiple times and heard nothing back. I have heard while waiting inside from multiple other people that this is the worst Wendy's they have ever been to. Wendy's corporate needs to come in here and do something about this store to get it back to Wendy's quality and fast service!

Z3Bj7k_jlHuVS8Uj3pAgmA.text: This was my first time visiting this Wendy's location. I rarely eat fast food, but my boyfriend has the flu and requested a frosty and fries, so that's what I got him! If I could give this place 0 stars, I absolutely would. Customer service is everything.  I pulled into the drive-thru and waited for my turn at the speaker. When it was finally my turn, the vehicle in front of me was still slightly in the way of me getting to the speaker. I could only see half of the board with the menu items. The attendant came on, I said, "I can't see the number, but I would like the chicken nuggets meal". The attendant and another employee busted out laughing through the speaker and said, "I don't know what you're talking about." I again said, "I cannot see the entire board, I want whatever number the chicken nuggets meal is". The attendant said, "so you want a number 10"? I reply  the same way that I did the previous TWO times. Seriously, tell me my total so that I can move on from this unnecessary experience!! Finally, she gave me my total and I pulled forward.  The attendant opened the window and whatever she was eating/chewing on almost flew out of her mouth when she greeted me, and again she thought this was funny. The sad part is that this attendant appeared to be "in charge". I was absolutely disgusted.  Like mentioned, this was my first experience, and certainly my last. This Wendy's location manager should be thankful that it's in a very busy spot. If not, the location would be closed down.

d5iEiOWmjDpLqWudmAcYxA.text: This is the slowest fast food drive thru I have ever seen.  I live close by and I love Wendy's.  However, I usually go to other fast food places because of the wait.  The wait times are worse after 6pm.

n0cqd7u2DMAMFLYwfwlznQ.text: Somehow the 'system is down' every weekend between 2-4 or the people who work here are just lazy. Update the system or the employees

a3h7R598LzANAZFE7PYYUQ.text: They always take forever and they don't have the best customer service either. I love Wendy's, but not this location..

567Znqra_5-lnrIPM2Xa6A.text: A very bad experience. The people that cook there are not professional and the meat did not taste real. This is my third attempt to try them out and every time they get my order wrong.

IwwRkItDJrdwTuKDdRsU4A.text: By far the worst Wendy's we've ever been to. Went through drive through on 8/26/17 around 8:15pm. After ordering waited in line for roughly 20 min and when we finally got to the window the cashier said "it will be a few minutes we just dropped nuggets! Seriously! I told her the wait was ridiculous and to just give me a cheeseburger. They did give us a cheeseburger instead and when we asked for our Coke....imagine that they were out! It gets better, the food we waited so long for was stone cold! STAY AWAY for this Wendy's.

Nys-uGGVTLOEcyh-TbcmZg.text: Omg.  This is definitely not a fast food restaurant in terms of the wait.  Waited minimum for over half an hour on the drive thru to get the food.   This is ridiculous.   This is around midnight.

0qwtDNRaQaQj3EqYD67Okg.text: This Wendy's is so slow every time I come. They also aren't very pleasant people that work there. I have also had them having a conversation while I was trying to order. Just waited over 10 mins to even get to the microphone.

JWP5i_Eggz49jzfBEh3muA.text: Sat in the drive-through line for at least 15 minutes, you could hear the guy on his microphone talking junk about everybody that was in the drive-through service was super slow and I'm definitely not coming back.

fHzT6afv6zJA89Sty2mODw.text: Maybe I just hit it at the wrong time, but 12:30 on a Thursday, the drive thru line wrapped around the building TWICE!... After jockeying for a parking space, I walked in and the line was to the back of the dining area.  I walked away very hungry and frustrated as it took me another 10min to get out of the parking lot due to the wrapped drive thru line and all the cars trying to get in and out.   FAIL.

P48Ai5wctAAcjHXn_cOARA.text: It is Wendy's. Lunch lines are long but they have the system down pat. Lines moves fast, food is hot and ready to go. Grab a quick lunch and keep on your busy way.

mPIo7TAmrqPu_INt4gC2tQ.text: Well I guess you shouldn't come here during lunch rush. I came at 3pm on a Tuesday and everything was great. Destiny was the cashier and was super nice and explained the new jr bacons for me.. it's been awhile Wendy's.  Got through the line and got my food in under 5 minutes. No problems with the food. The 4 for 4 is a good deal when you're on the move. No bad experiences for me and hate seeing all the negative things that have happened for other folks that have came here.

photos.caption: Photo of Wendy's - Charlotte, NC, United States. Seating area.

ubqKkWurk8Z4rG7RGYL4YQ.text: Wendy's Management Team,  12/09 a.m.  Around 12:15 am.  This is my experience at your location.   Yesterday I took my children to see a movie and after the movies we encountered a display of unprofessionalism and unmannerable behavior I have ever witnessed. I pulled into your drive through and waited for 10 minutes and there were no answer. I yelled into the speakers multiple times and I received no answer. I assumed you all were closed. After googling to verify that there was no anomalie, i continues to yell. "Excuse me!" "Anyone available?" After minutes what felt like hours, I finally received an answer, "Go 'head," I order. I pull up to the window. I stated, "I thought you all were closed, no one came to the speaker for 10-15 minutes, the cashier looks at me as says "It's OKAY" in a condescending voice. In shock, I stopped and looked up, she then says "hurry up I'm busy." I could not believe it. I stated "Are you kidding me?" My wife stated let's go. We left without food. I could not believe the level of unprofessionalism. I would have never assumed that someone employeed would ever say something like that. I understand this is late night at Wendy's but I can confidently say that myself or anyone else I encounter will not be visiting Wendy's again. To employee individuals such as this, that makes a huge statement of your companies core values and reputation. I have never witnessed anything close to this experience.

VpA1qch4e86uP58Jz-vRbg.text: Dear manager,   Went through the drive-thru at 10.30 Saturday night. I asked for chill cheese fries and the woman said it will be an hour .... not sure how that's even possible at a fast food place. I let out a laugh at the irony of waiting an hour for fast food. She then said "i don't see the humor", then when asked what she said in shock of awful customer service she then started going off about how she did say it and this and that with much attitude.   I drove off- the owner will never be getting my money.

N3Y3GCUaq_j_B0WcSGzCUw.text: I spent 1 hour in the drive through line last night. I arrived at 10:30 pm, didn't get to order until about 11:15, and I finally received my food at 11:30. When I pulled up to the drive through window the workers were complaining and cussing about the fact that they had a long line in the drive through. When they told me my total and gave me my food they were so rude and would not even look me in the eye. I was very polite although I had already waited in line for an hour but I understand it was "busy" for them. Their attitudes were terrible. The whole process was frustrating and the workers made me uncomfortable and disrespected.

TXu6_LP9jLw2YHdNxDG-OQ.text: The drive through is unbelievable slow and the quality is poor. I received my food completely dumped out in the bag with ranch packets open in the bag and covering everything. I ended up not even eating it and throwing it away. Save yourself the trouble and drive to the Wendy's in Park Road Plaza because this one is not worth the time or effort.

z0TmhMyH2dEFZM-9flUhLA.text: This was such a confusing and sad experience. Everyone of the workers had this look of boredom on their faces. The girl at the register should have just been sent home until she felt better. She looked like she didn't really want to be there. The manager looked like she had just got up and came to work 5 min ago. The drive-thru was backed up so I guess that made the inside store slow because it took almost 20min for my food and then on top of that my fries were half done and my nuggets were cold and seemed like they were just re-fried.  That was a waste of good money and my time.  I won't be going back to this location. I've read the other reviews and apparently management doesn't care because nothing has been done about the negative customer service here.

RPK6i3IPDrITBNG-wGQy8g.text: Nothing fast about this fast food restaurant! I have been to this location several times and every single time the drive thru service is slow! It doesn't matter if 7 cars are ahead of me or 2, I still end up having to wait a ridiculously long time at a fast food drive thru. There have been 1 or 2 times that I have been in line and have just left because it was taking too long. They do not even have friendly staff to make up for it.  The last experience I had here it was 2 am and there were only 2 cars ahead of us and it was still a 20 min ordeal. And to top it off I was missing a burger from my order.   If you just have a burning desire for Wendy's that will not go away and will wait as long as it takes to get it, than come here. If not, AVOID!

roZh4kPFCNtEK44c8MWtxQ.text: Took about 15 to even take my order. The Phat bish that look like jiggly puff took my order with an attitude, I asked for a strawberry lemonade and he gave me a lemonade mixed with strawberry Fanta out of his coco cola machine. Lazy ass worker .

photos.caption: Photo of Wendy's - Charlotte, NC, United States

cZCicSBJhm3WG7ARGrVoIA.text: Just no. Cold nuggets, half cold burger, & salt lick fries. The ladies at the front could not get the orders together. One girl kept saying about an older lady that also works  there "she's getting on my nerves." Gee thanks for sharing & btw, y'all are ALL getting on mine. The young girl also had a bunch of stuff in her hair. I seriously thought twice about leaving but I had a Doctors appointment & didn't have time to go any place else. Ughhhh why aren't they required to wear hair nets or something? I love Wendy's but this is by far the worst one I've ever been to.

xKIAEEKsfnCdYHmPhqzXSA.text: Fast food is fast food, but unfortunately every time I have come to this Wendy's location I have been extremely disappointed with the staff. On a recent drive thru visit, the individual who took my order was basically having a conversation with another employee while I was placing my order, which in turn probably caused the fact that my order was wrong.  And, second, they are very short and can be somewhat rude at times. Even though the service is poor and my orders haven't been right every time, I will say I do love their burgers. I always order the cheeseburger with ketchup and pickles only, add extra pickles. This way I know it is made fresh to my order and is always good. The fries are hit or miss. If made fresh they are great, but honestly you can tell when they have been sitting around for a while.  I do like that this location is close to where I live, but know there are better places for a quick burger and fries that aren't hit or miss.

32bmD55uZzOSO2uCv2D3MA.text: Slowest. Wendys. Ever. I literally waited in line for over thirty minutes on a Thursday night once, only to have them forget my frosty. I haven't seen the inside but my drive thru experiences have not been good ones.

L269tS4LaRByfGO6KtJdLA.text: I like the staff, but the place is terribly slow. The worst is the bad shape of the men's room. It raises food safety concerns and makes me not want to go there again.

B5O5CRMtF7so8sq0Xxi7zg.text: The worst Wendy's I've ever been to. Regardless of how many cars there are in the drive thru it's always super slow. Workers couldn't care any less and the order is often wrong. I'll drive out of my way to go to a different Wendy's even though this one is by far the closest.

dPWV2ry4YKARTs4NBz8Ewg.text: Sat in line for 15 minutes. I don't know if it was the clowns ordering or the clowns serving the food that caused me to never give Wendy's business again. Avoid at all costs

Oge0_AGBtaVW0xGnDObkyg.text: The worst Wendy's in existence. Don't go here, the employees are so lazy and slow. They won't serve you because you come after midnight.

LmmMN1gTd-UkZgkFt7rgAg.text: I don't even know where to start this. WOW, was this an experience in more ways than one. At 1:30 on a Sunday, this place was pretty packed. And boy was the service s l o w. Honestly it took me close to 25 minutes to order in the dining room. If I hadn't walked here, and been craving a frosty and baked potato from just having my wisdom teeth out, I would have definitely gone somewhere else.   They had 1 single person working the register. She was nice, but extremely slow. It was almost comical how long this took. Luckily the food was ready in probably 3 minutes after I ordered. Why they didn't have some one else come up to help, I'll never know.   The clientele that this place was filled with was less than desirable. To make it worse, there was even two workers 'on break' on the patio next to us, talking about their "baby mamma's & Baby daddy" drama ... I kid you not. It was like we were in a live-action version of Jerry Springer.   Save yourself the trouble and don't bother with this location.

31jLmes4iTpmkAdI7tCn9Q.text: 20 min drive through wait with 4 cars in line.  Left and went somewhere else.  Never again.  It's happened 2 times .  You call that fast food ?  I've seen grass grow faster.

0l3Botu7xahQBOsPaKbuJw.text: One star due to rude service in the drive through line.   I just pulled up and said "one second" bc I haven't seen the menu yet and the girl made a rude comment and said "oh well".   She did not seem happy to be working.   Left a bad impression.

Ing9ZO3a-APoz2YPATltTw.text: Terrible!  Out of bottle water, juice boxes, ketchup packets!!  Apples in kids meal were spoiled!

PW1CVoOQU00wZnOgR55lNg.text: The amount of time it takes from the time you pull up to the drive thru for the person to say hello and take your order is ridiculous. When the woman finally addressed me she says "yeah what do you want?" Only even at Wendy's is because Chick-fil-A is closed. For such a prime location next to the target you would think customer service would be a little better.

0sKh1ElopqzFKawhZuQYEw.text: I'm not quite sure why this place has such bad ratings because I just had a wonderful experience  I came late night through the drive-through and had a wonderful experience the food was great   TAY was so nice

fbmaSkk3Ly9n5j0iONYXsA.text: Why didn't I read the yelp reviews before coming here?!  Went thru the drive-thru to order a junior bacon cheeseburger and a sour cream and chives baked potato.  Was told they don't have baked potatoes now.   I should have listened to the tiny voice inside me that told me to drive away... but instead I changed my order to French fries.   Waited in line for OVER FIVE MINUTES. WTH?! Wendy's is known for being one of the fastest drive-thru places. NOT THIS ONE.   Finally got my order and drove home only to find out they got my order wrong. My receipt shows JBC (junior bacon cheeseburger) but I got a double cheeseburger with extra mayo. Gross. (The fries weren't good either.)  The convenient location (next to Target) is the only thing going for this Wendy's. I won't be back.

mtTD73r3o3cc1_J5QIfqCw.text: Update:  PLEASE SHUT THIS SPOT DOWN!!!! Out of lack of options and a little time to heal from the last experience here, I think I have officially learned my lesson... I will NEVER and I repeat NEVER come to this horrible joke of a Wendy's restaurant as long as I live and breathe! Not only did they mess EVERYTHING up on my order, but when I wasted the gas to come back, they REFUSED to give me my money back!!!! Told me to come back the next day since the manager wasn't there. Um WHAT?!?!?? Only to come back the next day, and the clueless and disgustingly rude manager on duty told me there was nothing she do since she had no knowledge of the situation. RECEIPT IN HAND AND ALL!!!! She also told me to come back the next day and I LOST it. This place is nasty, old and tired and has the staff to match. Please please please shut this place down!!! I'm BEGGING you.

photos.caption: Photo of Wendy's - Charlotte, NC, United States. Two pieces or dry chicken does NOT equal a piece of grilled chicken!

NUs9t2biJed7JqJwBLucTg.text: The girls that were working tonight round midnight were very unprofessional. Sitting out front smoking where everyone can see. Then comes on the speaker to take my order. I said give me a moment. In the back ground she says "she's in line but don't know what she wants" I clearly asked you for a moment plus your board was dark and I couldn't see it as well. You work in fast food if you gotta problem working with the public i suggest you not work in this field. Wendys should really stop hiring rude and ghetto acting people to work and handle food!!! Obviously you can't get a real job so you work there!! Won't be coming back!

ArIdcHe_NA373i6MjtFwtg.text: Went through drive-through tonight and waited nearly 10 minutes for my food. More than a little disappointed with how the salad looked--got the inside dregs of the head of iceberg--the picture on the menu makes it look like it's a nice mix of green lettuces, felt like False advertising. Our chicken nuggets were barely warm, and my soda cup was no where near full. Disappointed and wouldn't stop here again.

photos.caption: Photo of Wendy's - Charlotte, NC, United States. Taco salad before adding chili

9VYXLeyP5W02_ydhtDTqgg.text: This is one of those drive thru's where you roll the dice with how long it will take. Are you feeling lucky?  So here's really the only thing to know about this location: if you're running tight or short on time, don't hit the drive thru unless there's only one car in line. I'm not sure why, but it's always so slow.  The food is consistent with what you'd expect from a Wendy's. Although the drive thru is slow, I will say that every time I go the workers are nice.

XymmqAiTkX1EUOj_5DT37w.text: Went to this Wendy's at 2:03 since the "hours" say 3 and no one answered at the speaker. We decided to love to the window and the lady at the window, who was on her phone, turned her back on me as if I wasn't even there. Another lady was cleaning the kitchen floor just staring at us and mumbling words. We were given ugly attitudes when they could've just told us they were closed. Shameful. Will be staying away.

photos.caption: Photo of Wendy's - Charlotte, NC, United States. Employees ignoring us.
Photo of Wendy's - Charlotte, NC, United States

C4kTj7fJonpRtl_Amx1DCA.text: So yes, this is fast food, and yes it can be a long wait at times - but I thought they did a reasonable job when I ordered a salad (yes, I ordered a salad at a hamburger joint, sue me).  The one thing I don't really like at this, or many other, places, is you get this somewhat pre-packed salads, which is kinda annoying, but the thing was huge, and I ate and ate and ate, and my co-diners were done some time ago. Felt bad, without feeling too bad.  But all in all, the experience wasn't horrible.

YFwY2sSRXba3mjPw_Tyt9A.text: The drive through cashier was so rude she had no patience and rushed my order. I tired to be as polite as I could possible be, but I guess that was not enough. Some people should not be left alone to run a business. My order was messed up, and made poorly!

kkJJI9JFjMvOgBmresSBgQ.text: You know I got to be real with you on this one I just left this place was kind of in a good mood about to get a frosty enjoy my frosty when I just got some of the worst customer service ever from this young lady at the window was very nonchalant. With a nasty attitude. I tried to give her 40 cents. Because be the frosty was 1.40 I tried giving her 5.40 she said it was too late. Said take what I give you and have a nice day. Really I just threw the frosty away I'm done you guys don't worry about me ever coming back there and trust me I will be calling corporate. -5 stars

h0XNi08rPLk_2m2CmUxb4Q.text: This Wendy's is the worst Wendy's in the vicinity of Charlotte. We waited 20 minutes in a drive thru at 12am midnight. I understand, it's late night, lots to deal with, blah blah blah. They literally took one order at a time at the window. Equals out to one every 5 minutes. They are rude, act like people owe them something for coming to their store,rude people with no Sense of customer service. etc. find somewhere else to go to get a quicker meal: McDonald's, jack on the box, Burger King. Hell, order Chinese food and it will come out quicker than this damn sad excuse of a Wendy's.

7IkEWfx0EFXOvGDFeQHbiA.text: Issues, issues, issues...  Half-cooked, but hot fries. Cold chicken nuggets. I was afraid that I might get sick eating this food. I hadn't eaten all day. Sweet tea = disgusting. I'm not sure what's going on with this location but I hope it gets better. It is in a prime location, which allows it to get tons of traffic; especially being the only Wendy's in the area. However, partially raw fries and literally COLD chicken nuggets, is not appealing. I'm sure it isn't to anyone and definitely wasn't for me. The only reason I'm giving this location two stars, is because the employee who swiped my card was friendly and I didn't have to wait very long in the drive-thru line.

MKGV00U72OBo5aGzHZK7Jg.text: Horrible. 30 mins in the drive thru line with only *4* cars in front of me. Never did get my food. Previous attempts at the drive thru were similar. Long waits for food and the food was cold when I got it. Guess that what I get for ordering $7 food

fw73tUANEktrFZSr_oE8LQ.text: Yikes!  Problems: Long wait - We waited for 10 minutes to order and then another 15 to get our food. There were only 2 cars ahead of us. Awful food - My fries were still frozen. My sandwich was cold. Horrible service - The employees were too busy chatting and socializing with each other. They didn't even apologize for the long wait.

MU6QDnugTACx3fFSKMPBxw.text: No matter if you go inside or you go through the drive thru, this place has to be the slowest fast food joint around. Don't come here if you have limited time because you will wait.  On my most recent visit, I used the drive thru. Not only were they slow but the person ordering had no manners, people skills or common courtesy. When I got to the window, he just handed me my order and said "Here".   Along with that, I ordered my burger without mayo and it came with it anyway. I doubt I will be back here.

5wVDJ7ZeZqJh8bO-SclTuA.text: Quite possibly the only fast food restaurant that should actually have the "fast" revoked from the title. This is the only Wendy's in the area, so we are forced to return even though not one experience at this location has been positive. The food is consistent with every other location, but the service is so incredibly poor.   I've come during the day on weekends, afternoons and evenings during the week and always find that there could be no possible way a manager is working.   Sometimes they are completely out of drinks-like Coke and Sprite and Dr. Pepper. How lazy do you have to be to let 3 flavors run completely out?  Tonight we came and there were the only 2 employees working the drive through lingering outside. While we didn't think it was possible, it was. Both employees took their entire break together so so the line just kept growing with no movement.   Normally I wouldn't rate a restaurant on service, but this location is so bad I felt compelled to review a Wendy's on Yelp. Technically I'm not sure fast food joints even deserve a profile, but as you see by the overall rating, I'm not alone and the world should know what they are getting into.   Save time and sit down at a decent restaurant. Or if you must, other close by "fast" food options close by are Which Wich, Subway, Burger King, Chipotle, Tzikis, Zoe's Kitchen and Bojangles.

cB0ar_WnPnWBUpgQ5Zq9eQ.text: Minimum 30 minutes in line inside or drive thru no matter what time of night. 9 times out of 10, your order will be wrong after all that waiting. Staff is unfriendly and sloowww. Management is worse. I've finally learned to just drive on by and that anywhere else will be more satisfying. Is it that hard to hire the right number of people and ensure they perform?

SMzpUvDLNe_XPkX7trlEbg.text: I just moved here here two weeks ago the customer service sucks more then McDonald's they frown at you like what do you want. I Saudi thank you didn't even get a response every employee looked like they didn't want to be there or serve anyone would never give this people my money or service again wouldn't recommend this place to my worst enemy that's the service you will get

PdpyPk_cNccX-zV1p93GdQ.text: One star is too much. We couldn't hear what the lady said over the speaker. Mom said hello and her grandkids started repeating her. The female employee at the window wearing the headset informed my mom, over the speaker, that she was dealing with a customer and hadn't greeted her yet. Those words don't read as rude but the tone of voice did. Mom apologized and stated that it won't happen again because she won't be back. The employee simply stated ok. Poor customer service can ruin a business. Perception is reality. The employee needs a break and also owes my mom an apology. My 9 year old nephew said she needs to be nicer. My 10 year old niece thinks maybe the employee needs additional training. In the end, the lesson is kindness on both sides of the window.

jJ-tFIdvznw6EQHq1kN5IQ.text: Great food, decent service, but the one thing that earns this establishment 5 stars is the incredible elevator music this place plays. Whether it's smooth jazz to typical calming music, this place plays it all. It was one of the most magical experiences in my entire life. Would come to again- 10/10.
